items.name: Another Life
items.desc: Save 10% when you buy 12! (Mix & Match) Glow, glow, glow; the warm sun of the life you seek to know. Soft and fruity, fluffy and smooth. It's a....pale....ale?

items.name: Best Bitter with Mills Brewing
items.desc: Save 10% when you buy 12 ! (Mix & Match) Our collaboration with Mills! Fruit flavours from the yeast, toffee and honey sweetness, balance with large amounts of Goldings hops.

items.name: Emerald Sky
items.desc: Save 10% when you buy 12 ! (Mix & Match) What a fresh feeling, seeing a glittering sky of emeralds and diamonds, so far up above the forest. This beer is pale and it's most certainly an ale. Wow, what more is there to say?

items.name: English IPA
items.desc: What is India Pale Ale? Has it just been branding in the past? Does it mean more now? This IPA has been brewed with experimental English hop pellets from Charles Faram, a large UK hop merchant. Varieties Jest and Olicana have been used to bring a newer world to older ways.

items.name: Golden Ale
items.desc: Save 10% when you buy 12 ! (Mix & Match) One more step along the golden path; windswept memories of garden beers. Golden Promise barley with Goldings and Pilgrim hops.

items.name: Native Place
items.desc: Save 10% when you buy 12 ! (Mix & Match) A delicate, sherbetty blend of fruity hops sitting on top of a soft and creamy base. Smooth, saturated and delicious.

items.name: Rainy City
items.desc: Save 10% when you buy 12 ! (Mix & Match) It's midnight and someones blowing a saxophone on the green. Raindrops hang like pearls across foggy windows reflecting city streets. The air is quiet while car horns and engines drift on by; puddles splash and ripple in the city.

items.name: Story Moon
items.desc: Save 10% when you buy 12! (Mix & Match) The woods were quiet with a heavy blanket of darkness woven throughout the trees. Ringing moon-glow revealed rolling fields leading down to the old thatched cottage. This scene was almost too still, frozen in light, but poised for the events that were about to follow....

items.name: Table Beer
items.desc: Save 10% when you buy 12! (Mix & Match) A beer for the dinner table, or a picnic in the park - or whenever really - but a lower alcohol content shouldn't mean lack of flavour. Fluffy malts, fruity yeast and a good dose of modern, intense hops.

items.name: Timeless
items.desc: Our first time using Strata: sweet, sticky orange and apricot with dank top notes. Noice. 6.5% heavy and full IPA.
